title: You can create assignment
description: Create a new assignment by specifying the details, such as title, due date, status, and priority.

title: You can update the assignment
description: Edit or modify an existing assignment by changing its title, due date, status, or priority.

title: You can give mark
description: Assign marks or grades to completed assignments and keep track of student performance.

title: You can change submit assignment
description: Modify the way you submit assignments, including changing the submission method or requirements.

title: You can handle your assignment panding status
description: You can handle your assignment panding status
